trans-unit.source: Sets the rendering style of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command" /> control, through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Format" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command" /> 属性设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Format" /> 控件的呈现样式。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates the usage of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat> class.
Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command" /> control as a button.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command" /> 控件作为按钮呈现。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command" /> control as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command" /> 控件作为超链接呈现。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。
